review: At first I was a bit skeptical about the FireTV and that it's just another box to watch Netflix on, that was before my friend showed me what the box is capable of. The fact that it's able run XBMC smoother than the Apple TV and is able run apps alone raised my curiousity. The voice searching and the ability to watch Prime content and be able to use other services natively without much configuration is what sold me to buy it right away. My only regret is that I should have been a little more patient and wait until the Cyber Monday sale to get the savings, but I think for the original price it does everything plus a bit more of what other boxes does.
